location.title: Outscale SASU
location.address: 1 Rue Royale, 319 Bureaux de la Colline

solution_list.title: Outscale Compute (VM)
solution_list.description: The FCU (Flexible Compute Unit) resource, enables you to easily configure and manage your Cloud resources.

success_case_list.title: Artificial Intelligence in the Cloud serving industry 4.0
success_case_list.description: Connect Your Machine (CYM) is a start-up that offers predictive maintenance solutions based on Artificial Intelligence. These enable companies to monitor and analyze the behavior of their machines, in order to define models for smooth operation and anticipate failures.

success_case_list.title: Securing SaaS application data by Design
success_case_list.description: Tanker is an “ Encryption as a Service” platform dedicated to SaaS solution publishers that wish to guarantee the ownership and security of their data. The platform is available on desktop, web and mobile, guarantees ownership, security and integrity to the users of these services and natively secures the data managed and hosted by Cloud services, in a few lines of code during the development phase, without the need for security expertise. The goal is to enable applications with Tanker to have ANSSI (French national cybersecurity agency) certification, after a quick quality audit carried out by an external laboratory.

solution_list.title: Outscale Network
solution_list.description: 3DS OUTSCALE has deployed a global network infrastructure based on the latest generation technologies

solution_list.title: Outscale Storage
solution_list.description: Secure, sovereign storage solutions that guarantee flexibility and scalability.

success_case_list.title: Collecting and analysing web data in real time
success_case_list.description: Belogik is a SaaS software solution that can collect, gather and analyse any kind of machine data from the web in real time. The solution is based on Elastic Search technology and the Python programming language. The whole application is designed to use Amazon APIs.

solution_list.title: Outscale Virtual Private Cloud
solution_list.description: 3DS OUTSCALE Virtual Private Cloud provides a space of Cloud resources totally isolated from other Cloud resources.

success_case_list.title: Deployment of Open Data portals in the Cloud
success_case_list.description: OpenDataSoft, the Open Data leader, is developing an online platform designed for the rapid and economical transformation of all types of data into innovative services. Provided in SaaS (Software as a Service) mode, the OpenDataSoft solution enables public and private organizations to build data portals to be used either on-premise, or in public mode within the framework of open data projects. This solution facilitates the publication, viewing, sharing and re-use of API (Application Programming Interface) data by business users with no volume limit.

success_case_list.title: Secure Sharing of Sensitive Data on a Sovereign Cloud
success_case_list.description: LockSelf is a French publisher specialized in cybersecurity that offers organizations a secure digital safe. After 3 years of R&D, LockSelf entered the market in 2018 and obtained the First Level Security Certification (CSPN), delivered by the National Cybersecurity Agency of France (ANSSI), immediately afterwards. The LockSelf safe is a suite of encryption solutions for organizations needing to secure the management and sharing of data on a daily basis. It integrates seamlessly with employees’ working environments and usage. Today, LockSelf works with more than 200 companies, mainly in France, from small businesses to large groups, with a focus on the health, public and banking sectors, as well as on consulting and legal professions.
